item.description:
By popular demand, we're going to try out the Newport Ocean Drive bike loop.

SIGN UP FOR THE GREATEST *BIKE RIDE* KNOWN TO MAN.
SIGN UP FOR Ocean Drive on Sunday, August 16th at 3:00pm.

This is not a race, but we don't go at a crawl. Biking should be faster than walking. We've had people in their 20s to their 50s. You don't have to be an Olympic athlete to join us.

If it is raining OR there isn't much demand by Friday night â€“ I will reschedule for another day.

I will be cross posting this with the Providence Bicycling meetup and the Newport Friends meetup. Please only sign up at one group's homepage - not both.

Meet us at Fort Adam's parking lot. This ride will not be on dedicated paths, but on the road. These roads are lightly traveled, but I highly suggest you wear a helmet.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike.

To RSVP, go to http://www.meetup.com...
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red road bike. Try my cell: 401-699-7304.
item.name: Newport Downtown/Ocean Drive ~ 12 miles
